ðŸ“– Summary: The No Ghibli Chrome extension detects and filters out Studio Ghibli-related content from Twitter in real-time. It utilizes a Flask backend with a Keras model for image classification and a Chrome extension to hide tweets containing identified Ghibli content, providing a user-friendly experience through a popup interface.
